name: repair
description: Resolve errors and stability issues with proper logging
steps: Error Capture: Log error message and stack trace, identify error domain
Chronicle Check: Search `repair-logs/` for similar issues, check `memory.md`
Root Cause Analysis: Trace error to source file, identify triggering condition
Safeguard Verification: Check WASM, PBR, and Zoneless compliance
Fix Implementation: Apply minimal fix, verify with test/reproduction
Heuristic Extraction: If novel issue, document in T3 protocol and update `knowledge-graph.md`
